# An example song

Song:
  Shuffle: yes
  Tempo: 120
  Kit:
    - bass:     test/sounds/bass_mono_8.wav
    - snare:    test/sounds/snare_mono_8.wav
  Flow:
    - Verse:  x2
    - Chorus: x2

Verse:
  - bass:      X...X...
  - snare:     ..X...X.
Chorus:
  - bass:      XXXXXXXX
  - snare:     .X.X.X.X
